conbody.p: Creating a Global Variable Profile allows you to save which global variables apply to which workflow. These Profiles can be migrated to Katalon Studio (KS) along with your projects.

li.p: On the left sidebar, go to Global Variable Profile and click on the + button next to it to create a new Global Variable Profile.
Right click on the newly-created Global Variable Profile and select Set as default profile.

conbody.p: Repeat the steps to create multiple Global Variable Profiles.

ul.li: You must set one Global Variable Profile as default.
You cannot delete a default Global Variable Profile. To delete it, you have to set another Global Variable Profile as default.
